TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Duration extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Represents the duration of time that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> is active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> \- or - \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> \- or - \<*object* *property*=""/> \- or - \<*object* *property*=""/> ## XAML Values *days* A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this duration. *hours* A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this duration. *minutes* A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this duration. *seconds* A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this duration *fractionalSeconds* A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds.

.method public static hidebysig int32 Compare(valuetype System.Windows.Duration t1, valuetype System.Windows.Duration t2) cil managed

Docs.param: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> to compare.
The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> to compare.
Docs.summary: Compares one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> value to another.
Docs.returns: If is less than , a negative value that represents the difference. If is equal to , zero. If is greater than , a positive value that represents the difference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Duration> instances with a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> are a special case with the following return values.
- If is Automatic and is not, -1 is returned.
- If is Automatic and is also Automatic, 0 is returned.
- If is not Automatic and is Automatic, 1 is returned.

The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> to add.
Docs.summary: Adds two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> together.
Docs.returns:
If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> have <xref:System.TimeSpan> values, this method returns the sum of those two values. If either value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>. If either value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>, the method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
If either or has no value, this method returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Duration op_Subtraction (System.Windows.Duration t1, System.Windows.Duration t2);
.method public static hidebysig specialname valuetype System.Windows.Duration op_Subtraction(valuetype System.Windows.Duration t1, valuetype System.Windows.Duration t2) cil managed

Docs.param: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration">.
The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> to subtract.
Docs.summary: Subtracts the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> from another.
Docs.returns: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration"> that represents the value of minus . If has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> and has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>, this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>. Otherwise this method returns `null`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following calculations all return a value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
- <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>.
